text: "Desperado" is a 1973 song by Eagles. It is the fifth track from their second studio album Desperado. Although it was never released as a single, it is one of the Eagles best known tracks and has been featured on numerous compilation albums. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Eagles (band) songs Category:Clint Black songs Category:Linda Ronstadt songs Category:Miranda Lambert songs Category:Westlife songs
title: Desperado (Eagles song)
